thread.title: 15 mágicas celebridades que hoy lucen como si tuvieran 30, pero en realidad sobrepasan los 40 años
thread.title_full: 15 mágicas celebridades que hoy lucen como si tuvieran 30, pero en realidad sobrepasan los 40 años

author: Fernanda Saide
title: 15 mágicas celebridades que hoy lucen como si tuvieran 30, pero en realidad sobrepasan los 40 años
text:
El tema de los años siempre nos ha importado -quizá demasiado- a todos. A medida que va pasando el tiempo y vamos envejeciendo, queremos que éste vaya más lento, pero es como si ocurriera totalmente al revés , y anduviera más rápido que nunca. Sin embargo, hay personas (como dice el dicho) que es “como si tuvieran un pacto con el diablo”, ya que hagan lo que hagan y corra todo el tiempo del mundo, jamás envejecen , y de hecho, en algunas oportunidades, hasta se ponen más guapos. 
Estas 15 celebridades hoy lucen como si tuvieran unos 30 apenas, pero la verdad es que tienen 40 e incluso 50. No podrás creerlo. 1. Sofía Vergara, 44 #goldenglobes2017 enjoy every day. So gratefull to be here. #barranquillainthahouse 
A post shared by Sofia Vergara (@sofiavergara) on Jan 8, 2017 at 11:05pm PST 
Gracias to my Glam squad for last night!! @kayleenmcadams @jillandjordan #kellyklain @covergirl 
A post shared by Sofia Vergara (@sofiavergara) on Jan 9, 2017 at 11:36am PST 
2. David Beckham, 41 Really enjoyed doing the special 75th Anniversary Desert Island Discs and choosing songs that have meant something to me at different points in my life. Hope you enjoy it. #DesertIslandDiscs 
A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Jan 29, 2017 at 2:03am PST 
Great to be part of singles day in Shenzhen today… Big thank you to Jack Ma … @kentandcurwen @victoriabeckham @haigclub @biothermhomme #lovingchina 
A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Nov 10, 2016 at 4:39am PST 
3. Ryan Reynolds, 40 Today, Guam. Tomorrow? Also Guam. 
A post shared by Ryan Reynolds (@vancityreynolds) on Jul 22, 2016 at 1:07pm PDT 
Having the best conversation. #goldenglobes 
A post shared by Ryan Reynolds (@vancityreynolds) on Jan 7, 2017 at 5:52pm PST 
4. Halle Berry, 50 Getty Images The big FIVE OH has taught me to be FEARLESS! I'm about to launch a lingerie line at 50. Here's what I know for sure… it's never too early or too late to do what EVER makes you happy. {a little BTS image from our recent @scandalehalleberry shoot.} #fearlessat50 
A post shared by Halle Berry (@halleberry) on Nov 14, 2016 at 2:24pm PST 
5. Pharrell Williams, 43 Getty Images Thanks for the sweater @99percentis 
A post shared by Pharrell Williams (@pharrell) on Dec 1, 2016 at 4:12pm PST 
6. Jennifer López, 47 Sunday best… 
A post shared by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Feb 19, 2017 at 10:15pm PST 
About last night… Valentine's day outfit. #redofcourse❤ #highponytails #hoops 
A post shared by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Feb 15, 2017 at 12:52pm PST 
7. Bradley Cooper, 42 AP AP 8. Brad Pitt, 53 Getty Images Getty Images 9. Mariah Carey, 46 
Hoy está con su bailarín Bryan Tanaka, quien tiene 33 años, o sea 13 menos que ella. 
Happy Valentine's Day!! #happyvalentinesday #happy #moments #bubbles 
A post shared by Mariah Carey (@mariahcarey) on Feb 14, 2017 at 10:16pm PST 
#happyvalentinesday #kisses 
A post shared by Mariah Carey (@mariahcarey) on Feb 14, 2017 at 11:19pm PST 
10. Jennifer Garner, 44 Oooo who's excited for Halloween!! Get your spook on ladies, it's time to get sCaRY Gives me an excuse to watch some Halloween favourites! .. under the blanket #Halloween #freaky #scarymovies 
A post shared by Jennifer Garner (@jennifer.garner) on Oct 27, 2016 at 1:58pm PDT 
Need some bright in my life and this chair and tote are doing just the trick! #hudsonbay . I do hope you are all having a beautiful day!! 
A post shared by Jennifer Garner (@jennifer.garner) on Oct 9, 2016 at 1:45pm PDT 
11. Paul Rudd, 47 #paulrudd #paulrudders 
A post shared by Paul Rudd (@_paul_rudd_) on Jan 8, 2017 at 1:18pm PST 
#paulrudd #paulrudders 
A post shared by Paul Rudd (@_paul_rudd_) on Feb 12, 2017 at 11:06am PST 
12. Jon Bon Jovi, 54 #JBJ – Photo by Norman Jean Roy. 
A post shared by Bon Jovi (@bonjovi) on Aug 17, 2016 at 9:50am PDT 
Did you get your copy of #THINFS? What songs will you be singing all weekend? : @davidbergman 
A post shared by Bon Jovi (@bonjovi) on Nov 4, 2016 at 8:35am PDT 
13. Tyra Banks, 43 Y'all… my schedule today is PACKED. Today I’m lovin' #BabyGotMatte in Cashmere because it’s gonna last through all my crazy errands, appointments and meetings, AND I won’t have to reapply link in bio! 
A post shared by Tyra Banks (@tyrabanks) on Jan 24, 2017 at 10:35am PST 

A post shared by Tyra Banks (@tyrabanks) on Jan 2, 2017 at 3:54pm PST 
14. Jennifer Aniston, 48 Getty Images Getty Images 15. Shakira, 40 Gracias a todos por regalarme un año más disfrutando de hacer música y compartiéndola con ustedes! Mucha paz y alegría para este 2017! / Thank you all for giving me another year of enjoying music-making and sharing it with all of you! Lots of love, peace and happiness in 2017! 
A post shared by Shakira (@shakira) on Dec 31, 2016 at 2:29pm PST 
…¡y sigue moviendo las caderas como si tuviera 18! Muy impresionada con sus movimientos bailando Chantaje,a ver si pueden hacer los míos!! You guys are really impressing me with your moves to Chantaje! Wonder if you can match mine… Shak 
A post shared by Shakira (@shakira) on Jan 25, 2017 at 1:21pm PST 

¿Cuál es tu favorito?
